name: Sentimental Analysis
author: ISPG

sections.description:
It shows the sentimental value of a comment. The comment may be an attitude, opinion or feeling towards something such as a person, organization, product or location. It also shows the overall sentimental value of a page or a post.
Use our free sentiment analysis API to know the emotion or attitude hidden inside any comment in English.
sections.installation:
1. Upload \”sentiment-analysis\” to the \”/wp-content/plugins/\” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.
  3. Request API Key from http://www.sentimentanalysisonline.com/page/api-request/
sections.faq:
Is it free ?

Yes. Its free.

From where will I get API Key?

You can request for API key from http://www.sentimentanalysisonline.com/page/api-request/

From where will I get API URL ?

You can check the documentation in http://www.sentimentanalysisonline.com/page/documentation/

short_description: Sentiment Analysis is the process of determining 'tone' within the context of a given comment.
